entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this morning then light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 March 2023
